title: SirTalent
author: SirTalent
content: Hello, I have recently found a legal contact for fixed matches and I am looking for a few bettors to help me pay for the matches, which are expensive. I give more information privately on my telegram:@SultradeI only need two people, this message will be deleted when I get them.

comments.author: SirTalent
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on December 08, 2023, 07:36:32 PMScamI have been scammed many times for looking for fixed matches. You haven't done any business with me to be able to say I'm scamming anyone, so let everyone make their own risks and decisions.

comments.author: Natsuu
comments.body: Quote from: SirTalent on December 08, 2023, 07:48:12 PMQuote from: Oshosondy on December 08, 2023, 07:36:32 PMScamI have been scammed many times for looking for fixed matches. You haven't done any business with me to be able to say I'm scamming anyone, so let everyone make their own risks and decisions.Well just post proofs that it is truly not. You cannot blame most people because in general and for the common good, this kind of fix matches that will instruct you to contact them personally lead to scams. So showing proofs of probably your previous transactions would be beneficial also for your own legitimacy. In any case, this will remain high risk I would say.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: Natsuu on March 29, 2024, 06:31:10 AMWell just post proofs that it is truly not. You cannot blame most people because in general and for the common good, this kind of fix matches that will instruct you to contact them personally lead to scams. So showing proofs of probably your previous transactions would be beneficial also for your own legitimacy. In any case, this will remain high risk I would say.There can not be proof of previous transactions or whatever. If the OP post anything, that is just also means to looking for someone to scam and nothing more than that. I have a friend which is like a junior brother to me, he told me about one in the past, I told him it is a scam but he did not listen but pay money and he was scammed. He was given some matches results and he lost them all. There can be match fixing but not in a way for people to make money because you can not know if the match is fixed or not and scammers are using that to scam just like what OP want to do. Also that there are laws that against match fixing.

comments.author: JMBitcointernational
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on December 08, 2023, 07:36:32 PMScamOne of the things that gives me Joy is this board is this clause’caveat emptor’and I am also glad that you gave him a name(scam that he actually deserved. So many people have Fallen victim of this their lies And they have seen It as a means To extort money from innocent citizens.I Was watching a match last month in a beer Parlour And the game Was actually going on smoothly And suddenly the refree gave one of the players Red Card And the man sitting beside me told me that the match is fixed And I smilled And asked him how he came To know  about it or If he has any proof And  up till now he has not answered me.This idea of fixed matches, for me is one the ways scammers use To extort money from innocent Gamblers ,And they will not come up with any reasonable proof that confirms their Propositions .

comments.author: pinggoki
comments.body: Quote from: SirTalent on December 08, 2023, 07:48:12 PMI have been scammed many times for looking for fixed matches. You haven't done any business with me to be able to say I'm scamming anyone, so let everyone make their own risks and decisions.What I read from this is that you've been scammed so many times that you want to return the favor one way or the other so you do your own scam in hopes that you can feel what the scammers felt, you got tired of being the sucker so you look for other suckers to scam.

comments.author: Yucky
comments.body: Remember, the essence of sports lies in the thrill of uncertainty and the joy of supporting your favorite teams. Let's continue to celebrate the spirit of fair competition and enjoy the excitement that sports bring to our  lives.  #Say No To Match Fixing
